survey_name: Electric Vehicle (EV) Charging Infrastructure Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand user satisfaction and preferences regarding public electric vehicle charging infrastructure to guide future improvements.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.routing_logic: If 'Never' is selected, skip to Q10.
questions.client_notes: Use a clear frequency scale to ensure accurate responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio button question with skip logic.
